page.title: 16School day,Holbeach Bank.
page.content: Children from the Hurn are picked up along the 3 mile route by school bus.School begins at 9 o'clock.We have assembly straight away every morning.Sometimes the children take it,on Tuesday the vicar takes it.After assembly,register and collection of letters,money etc.we usually spend the morning doing Maths.,English and written work.The afternoons are given over to topic,games,art and craft.On Wednesday we go swimming at Spalding pool.We have quite a lot of television programmes,and we use the radio and tape recorders too.We have just bought an overhead projector which is very useful.At the moment we have three classes;one for reception and middle infants,one for top infants and first yearjuniors and one for 2nd,3rd and 4th year juniors.We also do science and music and we put on plays.
